year.title: year
year.description: Calendar year in which emissions occurred

population.title: population
population.description: City of Melbourne population at time of emissions

gdp_m.title: gdp_($m)
gdp_m.description: City Gross domestic product at time of

residential_buildings_scope_1.title: residential_buildings_scope_1
residential_buildings_scope_1.description: Emissions from natural gas consumption by residential market segment within the city boundary

residential_buildings_scope_2.title: residential_buildings_scope_2
residential_buildings_scope_2.description: Emissions from grid-supplied electricity consumed by residential market segment within the city boundary

residential_buildings_scope_3.title: residential_buildings_scope_3
residential_buildings_scope_3.description: Transmission and distribution losses from grid-supplied energy to residential buildings

commercial_and_institutional_buildings_a.title: commercial_and_institutional_buildings_and_facilities_scope_1
commercial_and_institutional_buildings_a.description: Emissions from natural gas consumption by commercial market segment within the city boundary

commercial_and_institutional_buildings_a.title: commercial_and_institutional_buildings_and_facilities_scope_2
commercial_and_institutional_buildings_a.description: Emissions from grid-supplied electricity consumed by commercial market segment within the city boundary

commercial_and_institutional_buildings_a.title: commercial_and_institutional_buildings_and_facilities_scope_3
commercial_and_institutional_buildings_a.description: Transmission and distribution losses from grid-supplied energy to commercial buildings

manufacturing_industries_and_constructio.title: manufacturing_industries_and_construction_scope_1
manufacturing_industries_and_constructio.description: missions from natural gas consumption by Industrialmarket segment within the city boundary

manufacturing_industries_and_constructio.title: manufacturing_industries_and_construction_scope_2
manufacturing_industries_and_constructio.description: Emissions from grid-supplied electricity consumed by industrial market segment within the city boundary

manufacturing_industries_and_constructio.title: manufacturing_industries_and_construction_scope_3
manufacturing_industries_and_constructio.description: ransmission and distribution losses from grid-supplied energy to industrial buildings

energy_industries_scope_1.title: energy_industries_scope_1
energy_industries_scope_1.description: Emissions from fuel combustion within the city boundary for the purpose of energy production and energy use in energy industries. Examples of energy industries include primary fuel production, fuel processing and conversion, and energy production supplied to a grid.

energy_industries_scope_2.title: energy_industries_scope_2
energy_industries_scope_2.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed within the city boundary for the purpose of energy production and energy use in energy industries. Examples of energy industries include primary fuel production, fuel processing and conversion, and energy production supplied to a grid.

energy_industries_scope_3.title: energy_industries_scope_3
energy_industries_scope_3.description: Transmission and distribution losses from grid-supplied energy for the purpose of energy production and energy use in energy industries. Examples of energy industries include primary fuel production, fuel processing and conversion, and energy production supplied to a grid.

energy_generation_supplied_to_the_grid_s.title: energy_generation_supplied_to_the_grid_scope_1
energy_generation_supplied_to_the_grid_s.description: All emissions from the use of primary energy sources for the generation of gridâ€“distributed energy (e.g. electricity, steam, heat and cooling). For example, emissions from combustion of natural gas at electricity generation power plants inside the city

agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_activit.title: agriculture,_forestry_and_fishing_activities_scope_1
agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_activit.description: Emissions from fuel combustion within the city boundary  from energy use in agriculture, forestry, and fishing activities (including farm machinery, fishing boats)

agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_activit.title: agriculture,_forestry_and_fishing_activities_scope_2
agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_activit.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed within the city boundary  from energy use in agriculture, forestry, and fishing activities (including farm machinery, fishing boats)

agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_activit.title: agriculture,_forestry_and_fishing_activities_scope_3
agriculture_forestry_and_fishing_activit.description: Transmission and distribution losses from grid-supplied energy  from energy use in agriculture, forestry, and fishing activities (including farm machinery, fishing boats)

non_specified_sources_scope_1.title: non-specified_sources_scope_1
non_specified_sources_scope_1.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed within the city boundary  from facilities producing or consuming energy not specified elsewhere. This is most commonly military sources

non_specified_sources_scope_2.title: non-specified_sources_scope_2
non_specified_sources_scope_2.description: Transmission and distribution losses from grid-supplied energy  from facilities producing or consuming energy not specified elsewhere. This is most commonly military sources

non_specified_sources_scope_3.title: non-specified_sources_scope_3
non_specified_sources_scope_3.description: Transmission and distribution losses from grid-supplied energy  from facilities producing or consuming energy not specified elsewhere. This is most commonly military sources

fugitive_emissions_from_mining_processin.title: fugitive_emissions_from_mining,_processing,_storage,_and_transportation_of_coal_scope_1
fugitive_emissions_from_mining_processin.description: Includes all intentional and unintentional emissions from the extraction, processing, storage and transport of coal in the city

fugitive_emissions_from_oil_and_natural_.title: fugitive_emissions_from_oil_and_natural_gas_systems_scope_1
fugitive_emissions_from_oil_and_natural_.description: Fugitive emissions from all oil and natural gas activities occurring in the city. The primary sources of these emissions may include fugitive equipment leaks, evaporation losses, venting, flaring and accidental releases. Gas distribution is the most common source here.

on_road_transportation_scope_1.title: on-road_transportation_scope_1
on_road_transportation_scope_1.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed in the city for electric vehicles travelling on roads

on_road_transportation_scope_2.title: on-road_transportation_scope_2
on_road_transportation_scope_2.description: Emissions from transboundary journeys occurring outside the city, and T&D losses from grid-supplied energy consumption from vehicles travelling on roads including electric and fuel powered car

on_road_transportation_scope_3.title: on-road_transportation_scope_3
on_road_transportation_scope_3.description: Emissions from transboundary journeys occurring outside the city, and T&D losses from grid-supplied energy consumption from vehicles travelling on roads including electric and fuel powered car

railways_scope_1.title: railways_scope_1
railways_scope_1.description: Emissions from fuel combustion for railway transportation occurring in the city including V/line services, interstate passenger transport and freight

railways_scope_2.title: railways_scope_2
railways_scope_2.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed in the city for railways  from vehicles travelling by rail including yarra trams, and metro trains Melbourne

railways_scope_3.title: railways_scope_3
railways_scope_3.description: Emissions from transboundary journeys occurring outside the city, and T&D losses from grid-supplied energy consumption occurring from vehicles travelling by diesel and electric rail

waterborne_navigation_scope_1.title: waterborne_navigation_scope_1
waterborne_navigation_scope_1.description: Emissions from fuel combustion for waterborne navigation occurring in the city including freight shipping and private boating

waterborne_navigation_scope_2.title: waterborne_navigation_scope_2
waterborne_navigation_scope_2.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed in the city for waterborne navigation including waterbourne freight

waterborne_navigation_scope_3.title: waterborne_navigation_scope_3
waterborne_navigation_scope_3.description: Emissions from transboundary journeys occurring outside the city, and T&D losses from grid-supplied energy consumption including Waterbourne freight and private boating

aviation_scope_1.title: aviation_scope_1
aviation_scope_1.description: Emissions from fuel combustion for aviation occurring in the city produced by aircraft including helicopters, domestic intercity flights, and international flights

aviation_scope_2.title: aviation_scope_2
aviation_scope_2.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed in the city for aviation produced by aircraft including helicopters, domestic intercity flights, and international flights, etc.

aviation_scope_3.title: aviation_scope_3
aviation_scope_3.description: Emissions from transboundary journeys occurring outside the city, and T&D losses from grid-supplied energy consumption produced by aircraft including helicopters, domestic intercity flights, and international flights, etc.

off_road_transportation_scope_1.title: off-road_transportation_scope_1
off_road_transportation_scope_1.description: Emissions from grid-supplied energy consumed in the city for off-road transportation including Electric vehicles within city control conducting street cleaning, parks maintenance, park ranger, and Queen Victoria Market activities

off_road_transportation_scope_2.title: off-road_transportation_scope_2
off_road_transportation_scope_2.description: Emissions from transboundary journeys occurring outside the city, and T&D losses from grid-supplied energy consumption including combustion vehicles within city control conducting street cleaning, parks maintenance, park ranger, and Queen Victoria Market activities

off_road_transportation_scope_3.title: off-road_transportation_scope_3
off_road_transportation_scope_3.description: Emissions from transboundary journeys occurring outside the city, and T&D losses from grid-supplied energy consumption including combustion vehicles within city control conducting street cleaning, parks maintenance, park ranger, and Queen Victoria Market activities

solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_.title: solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_1
solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_.description: Emissions from solid waste generated in the city and disposed in landfills or open dumps within the city

solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_.title: solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_2
solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_.description: Emissions from solid waste generated in the city but disposed in landfills or open dumps outside the city

solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_.title: solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_3
solid_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_.description: Emissions from waste generated outside the city and disposed in landfills or open dumps within the city

biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_s.title: biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_1
biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_s.description: Emissions from solid waste generated in the city that is treated biologically in the city

biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_s.title: biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_2
biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_s.description: Emissions from solid waste generated in the city but treated biologically outside of the city

biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_s.title: biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_3
biological_waste_generated_in_the_city_s.description: Emissions from waste generated outside the city boundary but treated in the city

incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_i.title: incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_1
incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_i.description: Emissions from waste generated and treated within the city

incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_i.title: incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_2
incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_i.description: Emissions from waste generated within but treated outside of the city

incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_i.title: incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_in_the_city_scope_3
incinerated_and_burned_waste_generated_i.description: Emissions from waste generated outside the city boundary but treated within the city

wastewater_generated_in_the_city_scope_1.title: wastewater_generated_in_the_city__scope_1
wastewater_generated_in_the_city_scope_1.description: Emissions from wastewater generated and treated within the city

wastewater_generated_in_the_city_scope_2.title: wastewater_generated_in_the_city__scope_2
wastewater_generated_in_the_city_scope_2.description: Emissions from wastewater generated within but treated outside of the city

wastewater_generated_in_the_city_scope_3.title: wastewater_generated_in_the_city__scope_3
wastewater_generated_in_the_city_scope_3.description: Emissions from wastewater generated outside the city boundary but treated within the city

emissions_from_industrial_processes_occu.title: emissions_from_industrial_processes_occurring_in_the_city_boundary_scope_1
emissions_from_industrial_processes_occu.description: Emissions from industrial processes occurring in the city boundary

emissions_from_product_use_occurring_wit.title: emissions_from_product_use_occurring_within_the_city_boundary_scope_2
emissions_from_product_use_occurring_wit.description: Emissions from product use occurring within the city boundary

emissions_from_aggregate_sources_and_non.title: emissions_from_aggregate_sources_and_non-co2_emission_sources_on_land_scope_2
emissions_from_aggregate_sources_and_non.description: Emissions from aggregate sources and non-CO2 emission sources on land

mrep1_and_mrep2_power_purchase_agreement.title: mrep1_and_mrep2_power_purchase_agreement_(city_of_melbourne)_scope_2
mrep1_and_mrep2_power_purchase_agreement.description: Renewable energy purchased through the Melbourne Renewable Energy Project reflects electricity that city consumers  (businesses and local government) have purchase which has no emissions associated and is offsets some of the emissions recorded for electricity consumption

yarra_trams_power_purchase_agreement_vic.title: yarra_trams_power_purchase_agreement_(victorian_state_government)_scope_2
yarra_trams_power_purchase_agreement_vic.description: Renewable energy purchased through the Victorian government solar trams program reflects electricity that city consumers  (businesses and local government) have purchase which has no emissions associated and is offsets some of the emissions recorded for electricity consumption
